title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame). When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
OB: When launching the Help view on Win2K, the tab key does not have any functionality.
SR: Ensure that the tab key functionality works properly in the Help view on Win2K.
